009package Synthetic_Noise;
010
011import java.util.Random;
012
013import ij.ImagePlus;
014import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
015import ij.process.FloatProcessor;
016import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
017
018/**
019 * TODO: Remove or bring up to standards!
020 * @author WB
021 *
022 */
023public class Add_Gaussian_Noise implements PlugInFilter {
024
025        static double SIGMA = 5.0;
026
027        public int setup(String args, ImagePlus imp) {
028                return DOES_32; // works only for FloatProcessor
029        }
030
031        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
032                addGaussianNoise((FloatProcessor) ip, SIGMA);
033        }
034
035        void addGaussianNoise (FloatProcessor I, double sigma) {
036                int w = I.getWidth();
037                int h = I.getHeight();
038                Random rg = new Random();
039                for (int v = 0; v < h; v++) {
040                        for (int u = 0; u < w; u++) {
041                                float val = I.getf(u, v);
042                                float noise = (float) (rg.nextGaussian() * sigma);
043                                I.setf(u, v, val + noise);
044                        }
045                }
046        }
047
048}
